item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1256; 05:16PM; 150 N Fairfax Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xadqAW; Fairfax; KNOCKDOWN: 33 firefighters extinguished the fire in 26 minutes with no injuries reported. While crews quickly extinguished the outside fire, additional crews entered both structures - ensuring the exposed, three-story senior living facility was clear. There was no fire only sprinkler activation on one balcony. No further details.; FS 61; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 4; BC18 BC5 E227 E261 E41 E58 E61 RA61 RA861 T27 T61; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1256; 04:50PM; 150 N Fairfax Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xadqAW; Fairfax; An outside fire in the alley is exposing and possibly extending into structures on both sides of the alley. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. Crews are knocking down the outside fire and making entry into both structures.; FS 61; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 4; BC18 BC5 E227 E261 E41 E58 E61 RA61 RA861 T27 T61; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Update Brush Fire; INC#0647; 12:20AM; Wb 118 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/2VigvOP; Chatsworth; All visible flames are extinguished and firefighters have handlines completely surrounding the burn area (contained). No structures were damaged and no injuries reported. This incident is located within LA County Fire jurisdiction and any questions are referred to that agency.; FS 28; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC12 BC15 BC17 CE84 CM42 DZ12 E104 E106 E107 E28 E290 E296 E70 E8 E87 EM9 H1 H3 H5 HA1 HA3 HA5 HE1 RA107 RA90 RI600 RM2 RM4 T90 T96; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire; INC#0647; 11:06AM; Wb 118 Fy x Topanga Canyon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/2VigvOP; Chatsworth; Approximately 1 acre of medium brush, winds 20mph (from the west) located at the WB118 between De Soto Ave and Topanga Canyon Blvd. Firefighters are in the offensive mode, working to anchor the fire.; FS 28; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 BC17 E104 E107 E28 E290 E296 E70 E8 E87 EM9 H1 H3 H5 HA1 HA3 HA5 RA107 T90 T96; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart

Traffic - FATALITY; INC#1461; 08:28PM; 10201 N Mason Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3jrkTDD; Chatsworth; Auto vs Bicycle with one person determined dead on scene (age/gender unknown at this time). All questions regarding the collision are referred to LAPD Inc# 4494 and the LA County Coroner. No further details.; FS 107; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; E107 RA96; CH8; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0512; 10:22AM; 1226 S Lorena St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ubqGDp; Boyle Heights; KNOCKDOWN: 36 firefighters (before the arrival of the additionally requested resources) extinguished the fire in 17 minutes. The fire appears to have primarily been an outside fire (numerous refrigerators et al in front of the small appliance business) which extended inside. Firefighters prevented the fire from extending into the attached medical clinic. The primary and secondary searches were clear. No injuries reported. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 25; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 E1 E17 E203 E209 E21 E210 RA14 RA809 SQ21 T1 T10 T3; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0512; 10:05AM; 1226 S Lorena St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ubqGDp; Boyle Heights; One story commercial building (possible appliance store) with heavy fire showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 25; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC11 BC13 BC2 CM22 E1 E17 E203 E209 E21 E210 EM2 RA14 RA809 SQ21 T1 T10 T3; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0489; 10:04AM; 2900 E 4th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3KgnYBW; Boyle Heights; KNOCKDOWN: 47 firefighters extinguished the fire in 19 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was prevented from extending into the attached single family dwelling. Incident command requested LAFD Arson for the investigation. No further details.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E1 E17 E2 E202 E25 E4 RA10 RA25 RA803 RA814 SQ21 T1 T2 T9; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0489; 09:45AM; 2900 E 4th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3KgnYBW; Boyle Heights; One story commercial building with moderate smoke showing. The building is attached to a single family dwelling on the back side and there is possible attic extension. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E17 E2 E202 E25 E4 RA10 RA25 RA803 RA814 SQ21 T2 T9; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Update Brush Fire; INC#0311; 08:02AM; 11850 W Foothill Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3x6uXcT; Pacoima; All forward progress is stopped, holding the fire to less than 1/4 acre. Firefighters are finishing getting a handline fully around the perimeter. Most resources are being released with some remaining on scene to conduct mop up operations to ensure no hot spots remain. No injuries reported. No further details and no further updates anticipated. ; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC12 BC15 E24 E274 E275 E298 E7 E77 E81 E90 E91 EM15 H1 H3 H5 H6 HA1 HA3 HA5 HA6 HE1 RA77 RA98 T74 T75 T98 WT77; CH5; 18; Margaret Stewart
